overview: Bel Ami`s award-winning and much-imitated "101 Men" series are the best selling solo videos in the history of adult entertainment. "Boywatch" picks up where "101 Men" left off, presenting choice specimens from our ongoing search for the most desirable young men in the world. The fourth edition of "Boywatch" follows the pattern of its predecessors, with a total of 30 stud-pups. The ten whom George Duroy considers to have the best chance of going on to Bel Ami stardom were specially filmed by Marty Stevens, in conjunction with a photo shoot. Included in this group are the already-up-and-coming Rick Fontana, Sven Olafsson and Jimmy Larsen. The remaining twenty, filmed by Marty`s assistants, are included exactly as they were first shown on belamionline`s Casting Couch.
title: Boy Watch 4
